name: 林迪
objective:
無塵室之構成、恆溫恆溼控制、粉塵控制、過濾系統、環境測定、操作管理、針對電子工業之應用。
Clean room system, temperature and humidity control, particle control, filtering system, testing and measurement, operation and maintenance. This course focuses on the application in the electronic industry.

Week 11~12 無塵室檢測與性能評價
Week 13~15: 無塵室設計案例探討
